data.name: AssemblyOutsideLibDescription
data.value: The assembly '{0}' is not inside the 'lib' folder and hence it won't be added as reference when the package is installed into a project.

data.name: AssemblyOutsideLibSolution
data.value: Move it into the 'lib' folder if it should be referenced.

data.name: AssemblyOutsideLibTitle
data.value: Assembly outside lib folder.

data.name: AssemblyUnderLibDescription
data.value: The assembly '{0}' is placed directly under 'lib' folder. It is recommended that assemblies be placed inside a framework-specific folder.

data.name: AssemblyUnderLibSolution
data.value: Move it into a framework-specific folder. If this assembly is targeted for multiple frameworks, ignore this warning.

data.name: AssemblyUnderLibTitle
data.value: Assembly not inside a framework folder.

data.name: InvalidFrameworkDescription
data.value: The folder '{0}' under 'lib' is not recognized as a valid framework name or a supported culture identifier.

data.name: InvalidFrameworkSolution
data.value: Rename it to a valid framework name.

data.name: InvalidFrameworkTitle
data.value: Invalid framework folder.

data.name: MisplacedInitScriptDescription
data.value: The file '{0}' will be ignored by NuGet because it is not directly under 'tools' folder.

data.name: MisplacedInitScriptSolution
data.value: Place the file directly under 'tools' folder.

data.name: MisplacedInitScriptTitle
data.value: Init.ps1 script will be ignored.

data.name: MisplacedTransformFileDescription
data.value: The transform file '{0}' is outside the 'content' folder and hence will not be transformed during installation of this package.

data.name: MisplacedTransformFileSolution
data.value: Move it into the 'content' folder.

data.name: MisplacedTransformFileTitle
data.value: Transform file outside content folder.

data.name: MissingSummaryDescription
data.value: The Description text is long but the Summary text is empty. This means the Description text will be truncated in the 'Manage NuGet Packages' dialog.

data.name: MissingSummarySolution
data.value: Provide a brief summary of the package in the Summary field.

data.name: MissingSummaryTitle
data.value: Consider providing Summary text.

data.name: ScriptOutsideToolsDescription
data.value: The script file '{0}' is outside the 'tools' folder and hence will not be executed during installation of this package.

data.name: ScriptOutsideToolsSolution
data.value: Move it into the 'tools' folder.

data.name: ScriptOutsideToolsTitle
data.value: PowerShell file outside tools folder.

data.name: UnrecognizedScriptDescription
data.value: The script file '{0}' is not recognized by NuGet and hence will not be executed during installation of this package.

data.name: UnrecognizedScriptSolution
data.value: Rename it to install.ps1, uninstall.ps1 or init.ps1 and place it directly under 'tools'.

data.name: UnrecognizedScriptTitle
data.value: Unrecognized PowerShell file.

data.name: WinRTObsoleteDescription
data.value: The file at '{0}' uses the obsolete 'WinRT' as the framework folder.

data.name: WinRTObsoleteSolution
data.value: Replace 'WinRT' or 'WinRT45' with 'NetCore45'.

data.name: WinRTObsoleteTitle
data.value: The framework name 'WinRT' is obsolete.
